Summary
I am a certified data scientist professional who loves building
machine learning solutions. Currently, I am focusing on writing and
editing technical content on machine learning, data science, and AI
technologies. I hold a Master's degree in Technology Management
and a bachelor's degree in Telecommunication Engineering. My
vision is to build an AI product using a graph neural network for
students struggling with mental illness.
